mapper.sql: id, imei, role, account, name, phone, calibration, radius, midpoint, jfdataUpdateTime, createtime, atlasttime, password,isDelete,age, avatar, gender, address, wechat, qq, weight, born, height, code, walkCount, walkPushTime,love,bedId,nurseId,illness,liveTime
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN tp.gender='男' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS male, SUM(CASE WHEN tp.gender='女' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS female,SUM(CASE WHEN tp.gender='男' THEN 0 WHEN tp.gender='女' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) as other FROM user tp INNER JOIN equipment tt ON tp.imei=tt.imei INNER JOIN agent tk ON tt.agentid=tk.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM admin WHERE id=#{adminId}) tx ON tx.agentid=tk.id WHERE tp.role='使用者' AND tp.isDelete=0
SELECT tp.id,tp.imei,td.name,tp.bluetooth_type,tp.bluetoothmac,bluetooth_list,tp.bluetooth_status FROM equipment tp LEFT JOIN user td ON tp.imei=td.imei WHERE tp.id=#{equipmentId} AND td.isDelete=0

SELECT td.id as userId,tt.user_id as alias,tp.imei,td.name,tc.allNotifyOn,tc.heartLowThd,tc.heartHigThd,tc.hbpstart,tc.hbpend,tc.lbpstart,tc.lbpend FROM equipment tp LEFT JOIN user td ON tp.imei=td.imei LEFT JOIN user_eq tt ON tt.eq_id=tp.id AND tt.typeof=0 LEFT JOIN push tc ON tc.userId=td.id AND tc.alias=tt.user_id WHERE tp.id=#{equipmentId} AND td.isDelete=0

SELECT td.name,td.imei,td.avatar,td.gender,td.phone,td.love,tp.bluetoothmac,DATE_FORMAT(td.born,'%Y-%m-%d') as born,DATE_FORMAT(td.liveTime,'%Y-%m-%d') as liveTime,td.height,td.weight,td.bedId,td.nurseId,tp.phone1,tp.phone2,td.address,td.illness FROM equipment tp LEFT JOIN user td ON tp.imei=td.imei WHERE tp.id=#{equipmentId} AND td.isDelete=0
SELECT td.name,td.phone FROM user_eq tp LEFT JOIN user td ON tp.user_id=td.id WHERE eq_id=#{equipmentId} AND typeof=1 AND td.isDelete=0
SELECT tp.id as userId,td.id as equipmentId FROM user tp LEFT JOIN equipment td ON tp.imei=td.imei WHERE tp.imei=#{imei} AND tp.account=#{account} AND tp.isDelete=0

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user tp INNER JOIN equipment tt ON tp.imei=tt.imei INNER JOIN agent tk ON tt.agentid=tk.id LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM admin WHERE id=#{id}) tx ON tx.agentid=tk.id WHERE tp.role='使用者' AND tp.isDelete=0
